com.broudy.gcm.boundary.fxmlControllers

Class MainContainerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.enhanced.fxmlrelated.EnhancedFXMLController
      • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.fxmlControllers.MainContainerController

  • public class MainContainerController
extends EnhancedFXMLController
    This class is the base of the application after a user is logged in (customer or employee). Loads the SceneSwitcheroo and integrates the JFXDrawer into it.

    Created on the 8th of June, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy
